channel.title: startup on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in startup on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Customise your R startup message
item.description: We all know the R startup message. It tells us the version of R we are running, the date, the platform we are running on, and some informative tips on using R. When you’ve been using R a while, though, it gets old. Let me show you how you can customise your startup message!
